navigate.Slogan: Enhance your knowledge and awareness of sustainable agriculture

HomePage.Headline1: Learn and Play â€“ Expand Your Knowledge
HomePage.SubHeadline: Grow crops, manage resources, cut carbon emissions, and explore the path toward sustainable agriculture through an engaging experience.

CorporateFinance.Title: Game Context
CorporateFinance.Desc: The game is set in the rice plains of Thap Muoi, Dong Thap, where players take the role of modern farmers striving for sustainable agriculture. Using real-time climate and soil data, players simulate rice cultivation and make decisions about irrigation, fertilizer use, and crop management. Each action affects carbon emissions and methane output, teaching players how agricultural practices contribute to or reduce environmental impact. The goal is to achieve net-zero emissions while maintaining crop productivity. Through data-driven challenges, the game highlights the delicate balance between food production and environmental responsibility in todayâ€™s world.

MarketSentiment.Title: Game rules
MarketSentiment.Desc: ğŸ® Game Rules (very simple): Manage your entire rice-growing season through 4 stages. The lower your emissions, the higher your score! ğŸ† Complete the season to unlock new levels

EconomicEvents.Title: Important notes
EconomicEvents.Desc: This is only a simulation game designed for learning and awareness about agriculture and emissions. It does not represent real-world data or farming outcomes. Play it with curiosity, explore your impact, and most importantlyâ€”relax, experiment, and chill while growing your virtual crops.

TrendingTopics.Title: Level 1: Seedling Stage
TrendingTopics.Desc: The player selects the cropping season (Winterâ€“Spring, Summerâ€“Autumn, or Autumnâ€“Winter), the cultivation method (traditional, AWD, or regular rainfall), and the type of basal fertilizer. The system then calculates the initial emissions

AutomatedStockValuation.Title: Level 2: Tillering Stage
AutomatedStockValuation.Desc: The player adjusts the amount of irrigation water and fertilizer applied. At the end of this stage, the system calculates the emission rate

AIChatbot.Title: Level 3: Panicle Initiation Stage
AIChatbot.Desc: The player continues managing water and nutrients. At the end of the stage, the system records the emissions generated.

AIRanking.Title: Level 4: Milkâ€“Harvest Stage
AIRanking.Desc: The player continues irrigation and fertilizer management. The system calculates the total emissions for the entire crop season, which are displayed in a summary table. At the end of the game, the player receives a summary of total emissions and cultivation efficiency. If emissions exceed the threshold, the player must restart and optimize their strategy. If low-emission targets are achieved, the player advances to the next level, where environmental conditions become more challenging
